Docs.summary: Indicates current system power status information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus> class represents information about the current AC line power status, battery charging status, and battery charge status.
This class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.PowerStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class to indicate current system power information.
## Examples The following example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control and displays the current value of the associated property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control when a list item selected.
